about_the_game:
Engage in fisticuffs with your friends online or on the couch. Up to 8 players can dispute online!

A gentleman comes prepared! Grab insane items from around the map to wield against your friends. Battle with bombs and baseball bats, lay down explosive mines and snapping bear traps, and prepare for battle.

SHATTER AND SMASH

A gentleman throws down wherever dispute strikes– gardens, banquet halls, even private islands. Each environment is entirely destructible– after all, what worth are luxuries if you can’t call yourself a winner?

Absurd hazards are included in each scene– ornamental (and fully functional) artillery cannons, precariously placed crystal chandeliers, even a pet shark, Rufus.


PICK YOUR PERKS

Between each round, pick a stackable perk to build a battle-ready gentleman. Double your damage, spill slippery trails of oil, supersize your traps, or even launch yourself from cannons! With each passing round, the tournament grows more and more mad!

Key Features

  • Play with up to 4 players locally or up to 8 online in ridiculous PvP matches.

  • Wield dozens of insane items to win the match.

  • Pick new perks with each passing round. Build a winning gentleman as the tourney spirals into disarray.

  • Destroy pristine and luxurious destructible environments.

  • Use absurd hazards to your advantage in each stage.

  • Customize your character with an assortment of colorful coats and extremely fashionable hats.

  • Marvel at the beauty of ragdoll physics as gentlemen take flight.

short_description: Be the last gentleman standing in this old-fashioned slapstick party brawler! Stack insane perks and wield preposterous and laughable items to cause maximum chaos. Destroy your private islands, gardens, and ballrooms. Anything it takes to prove yourself the most gentlemanly of them all!
